Posts.Content: hiya i had a left masectomy and auxillary clearance on 19th january. im due 2 start chemo shortly and have radiotherapy after that my consultant wudnt do reconstruction at the same time as masectomy, she said its because she said that blood vessels need time 2 heal and that i needed time 2 heal. she never recomends recon straight away. she said its best 2 wait a year after treatment just 2 give body a chance 2 get over treatment hope this helps   tree xxxx
Posts.Title: Immediate or delayed recon?

Posts.Content: hi, im bein treated at the queen elizabeth hospital in gateshead. i had 2 wait 11 days hope the results r gud huni from tree xx
Posts.Title: How long have you had to wait between surgery and "specimen" results...

Posts.Content: me too. i am 40 and havnt had a period since my 3rd fec which was 5 months ago, i get hot flushes although seem to be getting less, but yeah great if thats it, i know what you mean about iron levels,
Posts.Title: Early menopause brought on by chemo

Posts.Content: hi has any1 had tomotherapy, every1 ive asked has never heard of it
Posts.Title: tomotherapy

Posts.Content: im so sorry to hear about your experience. i had a tabard thing on and it undone by velcro, i had my last treatment today i had a man on my 1st appointment helpin gettin me in position 4 my treatment, he was very nice and understanding, if i had a prob wiv anythin i just told him, he wud do his best to sort things for me. he put my cd on for me to listen to while i was havin treatment, i had no worries as there was always a woman in the room with us, i got cxream called QV to use on my skin, the nurses gave it to me and told me it was the only cream i could use, hope this is help[ful there wasnt a dry eye in treatment room today even the man was bit teary wen they read my thankyou card, he asked if i cud copy the cd for him lol i would get intouch with pals at your hospital and complain as its your body, you have ur rights and dignity, maybe you could speak to your breast care nurse aswell   soz i couldnt help tree xx
Posts.Title: Positive to negative

Posts.Content: hiya, i had 3 lots of docetaxol and 2 b honest i cudnt get about 4 nearly10 days, my legs where the worst, i was hospitalised twice due 2 infection and was takin so many anti biotics that i got oral thrush, my mouth was so sore that i cudnt eat, i found that wen i cud eat i was just eatin ice cream as it was the only thing i cud taste.  some very lucky ppl on here had tramadol painkillers 4 the pain but i found that ur body is havin enough crap shoved thru it so i didnt take any painkillers at all i also had bad bowel trouble and am now on a mild laxitive to help me x   hope ur feelin better soon tree xx
Posts.Title: Docetaxol You B*****D !!!
